verbs.description: untangle (third-person singular simple present untangles, present participle untangling, simple past and past participle untangled)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To remove tangles or knots from.
examples: With gentle combing, untangle your hair.

entries.meaning: (transitive, by extension, figurative) To remove confusion or mystery from.
examples: It took a while, but he finally untangled the problem.
